jobs.title: Digital Marketing Specialist - Growth
jobs.description:
UENI helps small and very small enterprises to go online. Unlike typical do-it-yourself website builders, we are a “do it for me” solution. The simple website is free and hosted on our domain, but it is search-engine optimized and includes personalized, high-quality content. Businesses can upgrade their sites with additional services like domain names, email addresses, advanced SEO, logos, and since very recently a high-quality Ecommerce platform.
Beyond online tools, we also offer third party solutions that a small business might need to help them grow. This includes business bank accounts, point of sale terminals, SMS marketing, online ads, loans and more. In this way, UENI is the one-stop-shop for all the tools a small business needs to grow.

Today we are signing up 3,000 businesses every day and we operate in 10 - soon 11 -  countries in Europe, North America, South America and Asia. We are growing our global presence every month. To date, UENI has raised $30m mainly from successful entrepreneurs and we are just getting started.


The Role:
* You will work on short term campaigns and long term strategy, always with a focus on scalable acquisition and ROI
* You will create highly-targeted Email-marketing, using all the segmentation tricks in the book
* You will identify the best channels for advertising campaigns in the relevant markets
* You will liaise with the PPC team to set up and optimize online advertising campaigns on Facebook Ads, Google AdWords, Instagram, etc.
* You will drive results in the company using your creativity, thinking outside the box, and coming up with original solutions to everyday problems
* Proven experience in a high-growth startup environment, where you meaningfully contributed to growth (and can speak about the specific things you did)
3+ years experience with all of the following activities: 
CRO / Landing Page Optimisation
Monetization of a SaaS product
Highly-personalized, mass volume direct marketing
You are a driver for game-changing acquisition and growth. You move fast and you own the responsibility of delivering results
You’re fluent in marketing automation, using Zapier, webhooks and APIs wherever available, but you’re also not afraid to launch a manual process to evaluate before implementing a definitive solution
You have experience with growth hacking tools - you use these tools to make yourself and the team more productive
You are relentless for results and you have exceptional communication skills and high attention to detail
You are hands on and embrace the responsibility of ideating, executing, reporting and iterating results
Ideally you have experience with freemium subscription models
You are a team player and take constructive criticism or other inputs well
You can tinker with basic javascript and HTML
You are a native/fluent English speaker with creative copywriting skillsYou will use data to drive your recommendations about investments in campaigns and acquisition channels.

Requirements
* Proven experience in a high-growth startup environment, where you meaningfully contributed to growth (and can speak about the specific things you did)
* 3+ years experience with all of the following activities: 
					* CRO / Landing Page Optimisation
					* Monetization of a SaaS product
					* Highly-personalized, mass volume direct marketing
* You are a driver for game-changing acquisition and growth. You move fast and you own the responsibility of delivering results
* You’re fluent in marketing automation, using Zapier, webhooks and APIs wherever available, but you’re also not afraid to launch a manual process to evaluate before implementing a definitive solution
* You have experience with growth hacking tools - you use these tools to make yourself and the team more productive
* You are relentless for results and you have exceptional communication skills and high attention to detail
* You are hands on and embrace the responsibility of ideating, executing, reporting and iterating results
* Ideally you have experience with freemium subscription models
* You are a team player and take constructive criticism or other inputs well
* You can tinker with basic javascript and HTML
* You are a native/fluent English speaker with creative copywriting skills

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager
jobs.description:
UENI helps small and very small enterprises to go online. Unlike typical do-it-yourself website builders, we are a “do it for me” solution. The simple website is free and hosted on our domain, but it is search-engine optimized and includes personalized, high-quality content. Businesses can upgrade their sites with additional services like domain names, email addresses, advanced SEO, logos, and since very recently a high-quality Ecommerce platform.
Beyond online tools, we also offer third party solutions that a small business might need to help them grow. This includes business bank accounts, point of sale terminals, SMS marketing, online ads, loans and more. In this way, UENI is the one-stop-shop for all the tools a small business needs to grow.

Today we are signing up 3,000 businesses every day and we operate in 10 - soon 11 - countries in Europe, North America, South America and Asia. We are growing our global presence every month. To date, UENI has raised $30m mainly from successful entrepreneurs and we are just getting started.


We are looking for a customer-first and data-driven product leader, influencer and decision-maker who will grow our product.

You will:
* Define new product tasks and objectives,
* Manage the product backlog and act as the guardian for the product with the ultimate aim of putting the user first.
* We have major plans to expand our product offering and this role will play a key role in our future success.

Requirements
* 8+ years of experience as Product Manager, in an Agile/Lean environment
* Experience in B2C (priority) and B2B environments in a start-up (incubators in large corporate do not count)
* Previous experience in Fintech and/or E-commerce, especially in cross-selling of financial products.
* Previous experience with SaaS
* Previous experience with website builders is a plus
* Define the acceptance criteria and actively participate in sprint planning, sprint demos, retrospectives, and daily stand-ups
* Set sprint goals and articulate what success looks like and make decisions such as accepting/rejecting changes at the end of each sprint
* A great communicator who can easily build and maintain strong relationships with cross-functional teams
* A passionate and positive attitude, naturally collaborative, highly organized, willing to take on responsibility outside of your role to get the job done
* An analytical and inquisitive mindset with the ability to translate business cases and customer experience into tangible outcomes
